room_title: Escape room "The Secret of Dragon's Spire" by Escape Games at The River in Rancho Mirage
room_address: 71800 Hwy 111, Suite A-210 Rancho Mirage, CA 92270
room_description: Players assume the role of a band of medieval thieves who have entered the cursed tower of Dragon's Spire in order to find a legendary mystical artifact that holds the key to the salvation of the realm. The guards have been drugged but will only be unconscious for an hour, so the players must move quickly, or all hope is lost!
